dashboard.title: Microsoft Internet Information Services Web Server

data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_usage IS NULL OR cpu_usage < 85) AND (private_memory_usage IS NULL OR private_memory_usage < 85) AND (status IS NULL OR status = 'Started')) AS 'Health Score' FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_web_server FACET microsoft_internetinformationservices_web_server_name
SELECT uniqueCount(microsoft_internetinformationservices_web_server_name) AS 'Web Servers' FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_web_server FACET status

presentation.title: Status Distribution
presentation.notes: The status of the web server.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(microsoft_internetinformationservices_web_server_name) AS 'Web Servers' FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_web_server FACET version

presentation.title: Version Distribution
presentation.notes: The version of the web server.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_usage) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_web_server COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percentage of CPU being used by web server processes.

data.nrql: SELECT average(private_memory_usage) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_web_server COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Private Memory Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percentage of system memory currently used as web server process private bytes.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(active_requests) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_web_server COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Active Requests (Requests)
presentation.notes: The number of requests that are currently being processed by the web server.

data.nrql: SELECT average(io_operations) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_web_server COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: I/O Operations (Operations)
presentation.notes: The number of read and write operations performed by all application pool processes in the last second.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(total_requests_rate) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_web_server COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Total Requests (Requests per Second)
presentation.notes: The number of requests that have been served since the web server started.
